issue.title: [R] [CI] Enable multithreaded building when using linux-r.dockerfile
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14726](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14726). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to add a line like https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/d618498df6409e748e50d5a8266ddc33def08853/ci/docker/linux-apt-r.dockerfile#L82 to https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/docker/linux-r.dockerfile so that we build R builds in parallel when that dockerfile is used
